title: "Nvidia’s AI recreates Pac-Man from scratch just by watching it being played"
excerpt: "For its latest project, Nvidia researchers taught an AI system to recreate the game of Pac-Man simply by watching it being played. There’s no coding involved, no pre-rendered images for the software to draw on."
